radiographic_examinations.findings: Negative findings at the beginning of treatment and during follow-up.
Rarefaction and erosion of tibial and femoral metaphyses of the right knee.
Signs of synovitis and joint effusion.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: A new MRI showed altered signal areas with peripheral enhancement indicative of a colliquative abscess of the left knee.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Detected an increased uptake of 99mTc-MDP at the tibial and femoral metaphyses bilaterally.
Revealed an enlarged spleen with a single parenchymal abscess and multiple abdominal lymphadenopathy.
